text: {{$$textChunk.apologyMedium}}, I’m just a dedicated bot program. They don’t let me out much.
{{$$textChunk.apologyMedium}}, they keep me focused around here. I haven’t looked at the news lately.
{{$$textChunk.apologyMedium}}, I’ve been so busy that I haven’t had a chance to look at the news.
{{$$textChunk.apologyHard}}, I understand your greeting intention but my creator didn't teach me how to answer.
{{$$textChunk.apologyHard}}, I understand your greeting intention but I have no answer. Can you please try to ask the question again?
